trends: There have been no other sightings in Good Hope
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving home from macomb il and for some reason i just pulled into a gas station in goodhope, my wife made me stop to use the bathroom not sure how long i was there but i got back in the car and started driving home, if i hadnt stopped there i wouldnt have seen it. i looked out the driver side window and noticed three green lights in a triangle moving fast and pretty low about a thousand feet id say. when it passed over us we immediately looked out the passenger window and watched it separate into three separate lights moving indifferent directions one forward one left one right. i dont know what it was but it was really neat.
